title: Role with Multiple Resources
description: Create a Role named ||app-manager|| in namespace ||staging|| that allows ||create||, ||delete||, and ||patch|| operations on both ||deployments|| and ||services||.

validations.command: kubectl get role app-manager -n staging -o jsonpath='{.rules[0].verbs}'
kubectl get role app-manager -n staging -o jsonpath='{.rules[0].resources}' | grep -c deployments
kubectl get role app-manager -n staging -o jsonpath='{.rules[0].resources}' | grep -c services
